rooms.description: A welcoming entrance hall with ample natural light through adjacent glass doors and windows.
Spacious living room featuring large windows for ventilation and natural sunlight.
Dining area adjacent to the kitchen with open space for interaction and airflow.
Modern kitchen designed to be Vastu compliant by ensuring proper air circulation.
Two-car garage accommodating two vehicles with an integrated entrance for easy access from the main road.
Compact servant quarters ensuring privacy and convenience.
A functional bathroom with proper ventilation near the kitchen.

openings.description: Vastu compliant main entrance on the north-east side to invite positive energy.
Multiple windows placed strategically for ample natural light and ventilation.
Balcony providing an outdoor view and promoting cross-ventilation.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with large windows ensuring natural light and ventilation.
Additional bedroom designed to maximize space and privacy.
Another bedroom with natural light access.
Well-ventilated bathroom adjoining one of the bedrooms.

openings.description: Windows are strategically placed on the eastern side for Vastu compliance and optimal sunlight.

rooms.description: A versatile study room or additional bedroom with ample sunlight.

openings.description: Large windows for natural lighting and ventilation.
